name: Les Têtes Brulées
description: '''Les Têtes Brulées''' ({{IPA|fr|le tɛt bʁyle}}) are a [[Cameroon]]ian band known for a [[pop music|pop]] version of the [[bikutsi]] [[dance music]].  Their name literally means ''the burnt heads'' in [[French language|French]], but more likely is meant to imply ''mindblown'' or ''hotheads,'' although founder Jean-Marie Ahanda prefers the translation ''"burnt minds".''
